feature.desc1: Share your photos with your friends and family easily. No more sign up or premium plan.
feature.desc2: You can adjust the brightness, contrast, saturation, and warmth of your photos. After that, you can choose to save it as a new file or other format.
feature.desc3: Open your file from URL, tree view sidebar, file dialog, or take a photo straight from your webcam!
feature.desc4: Still want to view your photos while you're using other apps? No problem! Daruma has always on top feature built in that can help you multitask.
feature.desc5: Daruma offers portable version. So you can use it anywhere you go. No matter where you are, Daruma is always there for you.
